content: simple keyhole scarf ig @ginger_hook // rav @gingerhook materials notes 2 skeins of super feel free to extend the length of this scarf just remember the number of chunky/super bulky chains you add to the length of the scarf must be added to the 25 st leading yarn 100g each up to the keyhole for example if you choose to chain 150 instead of 115 i used gruendl difference of 35 in row 7 you must complete 60 half_double_crochet blo instead of 25 before living creating the keyhole 8mm/11/l hook darning needle pattern using an 8mm/11/l hook chain 115 abbreviations row 1 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 half_double_crochet into each chain to end chain 2 turn 114 half_double_crochet half double cro- chet row 2 chain 2 counts as first st half_double_crochet blo in 2nd st and each st to end chain 2 turn half_double_crochet blo half double crochet into back loop row 3 - 6 repeat row 2 only chain chain row 7 chain 2 counts as first st half_double_crochet blo in next 25 st chain 8 skip next 8 st half_double_crochet blo in 9th st and each st to end chain 2 turn repeat repeat st stitch row 8 - 13 repeat row 2 make sure to half_double_crochet into the back loop of the chain 8 as well gauge weave in ends 11 sts / 10 cm 4 and 16 row
